column1: WOR is an Elvish Sundocarme signifying "express
column2: cause to exude (by pressure)" and is an element in the word miruvor.

column1: Note that the root appears to have been rejected by J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: who wrote that "this is Wikipedia:false etymology ... there was not in fact any word wor- in Elvish
column3: Quenya or Sindarin." One can interpret Tolkiens note in several ways:

column1: *The Elves falsely thought that the latter elements of miruvor derived from a presumed root WOR.
*Tolkien altogether removed the root WOR (and its relation to miruvórë/miruvor) from the legendarium .
